        public List<Map> convertSitesToMaps(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                           List mySites,
                           String prefix,
                           String currentSiteId,
                           String myWorkspaceSiteId,
                           boolean includeSummary,
                           boolean expandSite,
                           boolean resetTools,
                           boolean doPages,
                           String toolContextPath,
                           boolean loggedIn)
        This method takes a list of sites and organizes it into a list of maps of properties. There is an additional complication that the depth contains informaiton arround.
        See Also:

      • pageListToMap

        public Map pageListToMap(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                boolean loggedIn,
                Site site,
                SitePage page,
                String toolContextPath,
                String portalPrefix,
                boolean doPages,
                boolean resetTools,
                boolean includeSummary)
        Produce a page and/or a tool list doPage = true is best for the tabs-based portal and for RSS - these think in terms of pages doPage = false is best for the portlet-style - it unrolls all of the tools unless a page is marked as a popup. If the page is a popup - it is left a page and marked as such. restTools = true - generate resetting tool URLs.
        Specified by:
        pageListToMap in interface PortalSiteHelper
        See Also:
        PortalSiteHelper.pageListToMap(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, boolean, org.sakaiproject.site.api.Site, org.sakaiproject.site.api.SitePage, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean, boolean, boolean)

      • getSiteVisit

        public Site getSiteVisit(String siteId)
                  throws PermissionException,
                         IdUnusedException
        Do the getSiteVisit, but if not found and the id is a user site, try translating from user EID to ID.
        Specified by:
        getSiteVisit in interface PortalSiteHelper
        Parameters:
        siteId - The Site Id.
        Returns:
        The Site.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If not allowed.
        IdUnusedException - If not found.
